Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.graphics

Class DynamicPaint

java.lang.Object
android.graphics.Paint
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.graphics.DynamicPaint
public class DynamicPaint extends Paint
A Paint to apply the Paint.Cap according to the DynamicTheme.
See Also:
